comment.body:
> [redacted](#comment_1_19qsuxKBkNZWYft3epWgn6u3gG82sQHs6n): It looks like nowadays you can use the "optional files" feature of ZeroNet for this instead, though you'd probably want to modify ZeroBlog to support this or something, since asking regular users to add optional files themselves may not be realistic. https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/issues/163

yes,but the file is to big for zeronet. maybe storj project or webtorrent can be an option ,but i'll keep try other option/
